#summary Fundamental essence
#labels GameDesign

Each element captures a distinct, fundamental essence of nature.

Primary elements:

|| *Element* || *Nature* || *Creature* ||
|| [Wind]    || Gases    || Breath     ||
|| [Water]   || Fluids   || Blood      ||
|| [Earth]   || Solids   || Flesh      ||
|| [Fire]    || Energy   || Life       ||

Secondary elements:

  * [Body] = Water + Earth
  * [Frost] = Wind + Water
  * [Metal] = Earth + Fire
  * [Spirit] = Wind + Fire
